page.title: 15THE MOSQUE
page.content: The{Mosque}in Jubilee Road was built in 1982. It is where{Muslim}people pray. We have to pray five times in a day. Friday is when people usally go to the mosque and pray. The mosque is big. It has a{green dome}with a {crescent moon,}and a round pole next to it, with a point. Inside the Mosque it is nearly all green and it has four rooms. Two of them are small. One of the is for the ladies. We have to take our shoes off outside before we enter the mosque. We have to wash our feet up to our ankles and our hands and our face. {Eid}is a day of celebration at the end of the{month of Ramadan,}When Muslims fast. We wear our best clothes and go to pray in the mosque. Families get together to celebrate Eid and exchange presents.
